data.text:
FLENORD WRIGHT JR.

ohtadmin |

Flenord Wright, Jr – lovingly known as “Sonny”, was born in Ft. Gibson, Oklahoma on September 6, 1941, to the proud parents of Flenord Wright, Sr and Bernice Littlejohn Wright. Wright’s early years were spent in Okmulgee, Oklahoma with 6 siblings. His parents later moved the family to Kansas City, Missouri where he attended school and graduated from Central High... READ MORE >

BERTHA SHAW

ohtadmin |

Mrs. Bertha M. Clegg- Shaw was born in Kansas City, Missouri on November 18, 1947, and was the only living child of Charles A. Clegg and Ruth M. Clegg. Bertha grew up in Kansas City, Missouri and worked for the Kansas City School District as a monitor for the transportation department. She attended Church of the Living God. Mrs. Shaw... READ MORE >

WILLIAM MASON

ohtadmin |

On Thursday – June 15, 1944; the oldest and only child for 8 years was born in Ashland, Mississippi to Thad & Mattie C. Mason – he was named William Lee. He was affectionately known and called by the nickname “Tootie” that was given to him by one of his aunts - (Aunt May) along with another nickname “Oodles” given... READ MORE >

TINA WILLIAMS

ohtadmin |

Tina L. Williams was born July 31, 1973, in Kansas City, Missouri to her proud parents: Brenda Willams (stepfather, Maurice Scott), and Larry Blount (biological father). She was preceded in death by her mother, Brenda L. Williams and paternal family: grandparents CD Williams, Roberta Williams and uncles: Melvin and Eugene Williams. She met the love of her life Aaron Porter... READ MORE >

VERNETTA BRYANT SMITH

ohtadmin |

Mrs. Venetta Bryant Smith was born on July 14, 1958, in Kansas City, Missouri to Levi Bryant, Sr. and Martha (Houston) Bryant. She was preceded in death by her father, Levi Bryant, Sr., mother, Martha Bryant; brothers, Joseph Bryant, Phillip Bryant aka “Doc”, Levi Bryant, Jr., aka “Butch”, Bishop Leroy Bryant, and Vonzell Bryant aka “Captain Vonzell. She grew up... READ MORE >

MARQUETTA SMITH

ohtadmin |

Marquetta Renee Smith was born on February 23, 1967, at KU Medical Center in Kansas City Kansas to Beverly Jean and Samuel Smith. She was baptized and accepted Jesus Christ as her Lord and Savior at an early age. She graduated from Paseo High school in 1985. Soon after graduation, she met and married Carl Smith. The couple gave birth... READ MORE >

RUTH JACKSON

ohtadmin |

Ruth “Danielle” Jackson was Born to The union of William McKinley Jackson and Anita V. McAlister on March 14, 1975. Later she attended Longfellow Elementary and Father Benedict Justice Catholic school. Then she attended Saint Francis Xavier Middle school and graduated from the eighth grade. Her freshman year of high school, she attended Center High school. Then she graduated from... READ MORE >

CAROL GRIFFIN

ohtadmin |

Ms. Carol Ann Griffin departed this life on July 23, 2024. She was born to her loving parents Melvin Monroe, Sr., and Josephine D. Monroe on June 19, 1945, in Grenada, Mississippi. She graduated from John Marshall High school, in Chicago, IL and began a long career at Standard Oil (Amoco now known as BP). She attended a vocational school... READ MORE >

ANTHONY CANADY BARNES

ohtadmin |

Anthony R. Canady- Barnes, 25, passed away on July 30, 2024, in Kansas City MO. He was born on February 20, 1999, in Kansas City, Missouri to Rachelle L. Huntley and Anthony L. Canady. Anthony grew up in Kansas City, Missouri, graduated from North Kansas City High School. After high school, he went into the workforce working various jobs. Anthony... READ MORE >
